name: Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe
description: The Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe is the Workshop equivalent of a Platinum Pickaxe , allowing Prospectors to mine higher tier metals ( Aluminium Ore , Platinum Ore , etc) at earlier stages of a Prospect while increasing yield. Similar to the Inaris "Neves" Pickaxe , the Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe reduces the over-encumbrance penalty by 10% when equipped.
